name: OddLaws
0:
”Alexa, ask Odd Laws for a law”
”Alexa, tell Odd Laws to give me an odd law”
”Alexa, ask Odd Laws for something odd”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: odd laws
des: Odd Laws gives you a random odd law from one of the 50 states. While laws are commonly updated or repealed, these are, or at one point were, actual laws.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
